DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Insulinemic Index Determination Two Products : Fructilight® A Fruit Fructo-Oligosaccharides Sweet Matrix
DOC.detailed_description: 12 male female healthy adult include study . During 5 separated visit subject consume either 50 g glucose water ( 3 glucose response test ) portion syrup supply equivalent 50 g glycaemic carbohydrate ( 2 syrup response test ) . Experimental session last 3 hour 9 veinous capillary blood taking . The experimental meal serve t0 consume 12 15 minute maximum . At time -5 , 0 , 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 , 120 180 minute , glucose measure capillary blood insulin measure venous blood . The glycemic index Insulinemic index determination 2 syrup start calculation glycemia insulinemia response AUC 120 min . The AUC ( 0-120min ) compute follow FAO recommendation ( cf . FAO/WHO 1998 ) , i.e . use trapezoidal incremental method take account area beneath fast concentration . GI II value express percentage calculate divide AUC ( 0-120min ) test syrup product AUC ( 0-120min ) glucose reference multiply 100 .
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 50 year ( limit include With BMI 19 25 kg/m² ( limit include ) Nonsmoker Nonmenopausal female reliable contraception two cycle begin study agree keep entire duration study Capable willing conform protocol accept give write informed consent Registered Social Security System Accepting register Volunteers biomedical research file After biological analysis , subject include follow criterion : Fasting blood sugar level < 1,1 g/L Blood sugar level 120 minute 75g glucose intake < 1.4 g/L Complete blood count without significant clinically abnormality accord investigator ASAT < 1,55 µkat/L ALAT < 1,7 µkat/L GGT < 2,55 µkat/L 45 < Creatinine < 104 µmol/L 1.7 < Urea < 8.3 mmol/L Known food allergy , particular one test product ' component related product Personal history hypercholesterolemia , high blood pressure , diabetes glucose intolerance Renal insufficiency Liver disorder ongoing Gastrointestinal disorder , clinically significant accord investigator Use medication could affect lipidic carbohydrate metabolism Disease medication impact nutrient digestion absorption Pregnant breastfeed woman General anaesthetic month study Presenting psychological linguistic incapability sign inform consent Refusing sign inform consent Under legal protection ( guardianship , wardship ) deprive right follow administrative judicial decision Having receive , last 12 month , indemnity clinical trial high equal 4500 Euros Impossible contact case emergency Major medical surgical event hospitalization last 3 month Taking part another clinical trial exclusion period previous clinical trial
